issue.title: dead rules
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard Browser Extension

### AdGuard version

4.1.56

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Missed ads or ad leftovers

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Chrome

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

-

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Turkish filter, AdGuard Tracking Protection filter, AdGuard URL Tracking filter, AdGuard Social Media filter, AdGuard Annoyances filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots



**! Social**

```
https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/commit/f116fcc69b7f301ff90f1b5de14d26e9dfe64f15
atvavrupa.tv##.social-container

https://forum.adguard.com/index.php?threads/resolved-evrensel-net.23640/
evrensel.net##.fa-pinterest

https://forum.adguard.com/index.php?threads/resolved-5-websites.17440/post-117935

https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/commit/da3312ff3242007427f33fe1d06c3b4675683031

https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/commit/dcab86c9ac06fc6e26111564fec2a8f69add8e9b
kentteyasam.com##.rhd-social-box-wrapper

https://forum.adguard.com/index.php?threads/resolved-medyatava-com-social-buttons.14798/

https://forum.adguard.com/index.php?threads/resolved-6-missed-ads.7932/#post-69660

https://forum.adguard.com/index.php?threads/resolved-6-missed-ads.11225/#post-87718

https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/16593#issue-324710215

https://forum.adguard.com/index.php?threads/resolved-webtekno-com-hiding-rule-needed.10094/#post-81209
webtekno.com##div[class^="share-counter"]

```

---

**! Tr**

```
https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/commit/f1c67bd60513dea0f010eb3374a4974ca62268fb

!

https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/commit/5deaef9c75a1e59f138d51155e6d6e64d01cae19
```

issue.title: www.sbs.com.au
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Anti Adblock Script) [https://www.sbs.com.au/ondemand/watch/1972771395804](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.sbs.com.au%2Fondemand%2Fwatch%2F1972771395804) ### Comment Username: @derpina-derpington > I am finding this same message is happening on a lot of sites - saying that I am using a adblocker when I have whitelisted the site/turned off adblocking. It's really annoying. It's most often when I am trying to watch videos. Especially annoying when it's a video in my own country on a computer not using a VPN etc. ### Screenshots

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://bbs.kafan.cn/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fbbs.kafan.cn%2F) ### Comment Username: @KevinGu0611 > I can't open the bbs.kafan.cn when using AdGuard. I have attached screenshots and pictures of the filter logs. When opening AdGuard, the website has been in the state of checking the browser and cannot be entered. No matter how long you wait, the website is checking the browser. ### Screenshots
